section1.title: Repair, Buy, Trade-In & Protect your essential mobile devices
section1.subtitle: Thunder Bay & area's certified device specialists.

section2.title: What can we fix for you today?

contents.title: QUICK DIAGNOSTICS
contents.content: Not sure what’s wrong with your device? We quickly diagnose your device to find out what the issue is. The diagnostic is free when you do the repair with us!

contents.title: Low Price Guarantee
contents.content: We want you to be confident that you’re getting the best price. We’ll match any local competitor’s published price for the same repair and beat it by $5.

contents.title: LIFETIME SERVICE WARRANTY
contents.content: We know you don’t have all day so we’ll return your device as quickly as possible. Most of our repairs can be performed in under two hours.

contents.title: LIFETIME SERVICE WARRANTY
contents.content: All of our repairs are backed with our lifetime, hassle-free warranty. This warranty is valid at all of our locations worldwide.

section3.title: Popular Devices
subtitle: Buy now. Pay later.
Whatever works for you.
section3.content: We’ve partnered with Flexiti to offer 0% financing on repairs, devices, and accessories.

section4.title: Thunder bay's trusted mobile device shop

data.title: Competitive Pricing
data.content: We’re proud to offer the largest selection of fully tested and graded pre-owned devices in Thunder bay. All backed by a one year warranty and lifetime IMEI guarantee

data.title: 1 Year Warranty
data.content: We stand behind all our devices with an iron-clad one year warranty that covers everything except physical or liquid damage.

data.title: Trade-In Your Device
data.content: Trade in your existing device - broken or not - for credit towards a repair, product or a newer phone. We buy almost every device, no matter the condition.

reviews.content: I needed a new battery for my iphone 6. After contacting several places who all told me the next available appointment was more than a week away, I called Mobile Tech on Corydon. Within 2 hours, my new battery was installed and ready for pickup. Great service and friendly staff.

Very glad I found this place! I send a request through FB to couple places asking for an estimate of the screen replacement and Mobile Tech Lab not only has automated estimation but they gave me a call almost right away to confirm that they have a part and it would be done in

My experience was excepion really amazing people working there with reasonable prices for fixing electronics, they fix your electronics with a super reasonable time frame,.would highly recommend this company!

headData.title: COVID-19 Safety Precautions | Snap Mobile Repair

section1.title: COVID PROTOCOL
section1.content: Our goal is to provide everyone with the best quality repairs at an affordale price with the fastest possible turnaround times.

section2.title: Take a look at our COVID19 protocols:
section2.content: Additionally, we are instructing our employees to remain home if they have any symptoms of illness and ask that our customers utilize the same level of caution. As the situation evolves, we will continue to take the actions necessary to protect our community. Our thoughts are with those that have been affected.
section2.bottomText: For more information or if you have any questions,

data.title: Thorough Cleaning
data.content: Our tools, work stations and counters are sanitized frequently.

data.title: Contactless Services
data.content: We also offer curb side pickup and drop off, and mail in options to customers in Thunder bay.

mainTopic.title: Find your device’s brand
content: Your device brand can usually be found on the back of the handset itself, but if for whatever reason you aren’t sure don’t panic!

It is indicated on back of the device, on the front, or in the Settings/System/About phone section if you are on Android or Settings/ IDs if you are on IOS. It may also be shown on the original box and/or manual that came with your device.

disableTopic.title: How to find the model of your device
disableTopic.content: The device model is indicated in the Settings / System / About phone section or in Settings / General / Storage. It may also be shown on the original box and/or manual that came with your device.

mainTopic.title: How to find the model of your device
content: The device model is indicated in the Settings / System / About phone section or in Settings / General / Storage. It may also be shown on the original box and/or manual that came with your device.
